plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Identifiant et mot de passe de connexion: MQTT broker login and password (separated by:)
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Topic racine pour piloter Jeedom et sur: Root topic to drive Jeedom and on which it sends its events
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Cocher la case pour que tous les évèneme: Check the box so that all order events are transmitted to the MQTT broker
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Liste des plugins Jeedom utilisant mqtt: List of Jeedom plugins using mqtt
plugins\/mqtt2\/plugin_info\/configurati.Sauvegarder et relancer l'installation d: Save and restart the installation of mosquitto to take into account the modifications of this configuration field

plugins\/mqtt2\/desktop\/php\/mqtt2.php.Aucun équipement MQTT trouvé, cliquer su: No MQTT device found, click "Add" to start

plugins\/mqtt2\/desktop\/js\/mqtt2.js.Liste : valeur|texte (séparées par un po: List: value | text (separated by a semicolon)

plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/php\/jeeMqtt2.php.Vous n\\'etes pas autorisé à effectuer c: You are not authorized to perform this action

plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Aucun dossier SSL trouvé, avez vous inst: No SSL folder found, did you install Mosquitto first?
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Le plugin Docker management doit être in: The Docker management plugin must be installed
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Le plugin Docker management doit être ac: The Docker management plugin must be active
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Pause de 120s le temps de l\\'installati: Pause of 120s while installing Docker Management plugin dependencies
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Delai maximum autorisé pour l\\'installa: Maximum time allowed for the installation of dependencies exceeded
plugins\/mqtt2\/core\/class\/mqtt2.class.Mosquitto installé en local sur la machi: Mosquitto installed locally on the machine, please remove it before installing the Mosquitto container: sudo apt remove mosquitto

info.json.Plugin servant de base pour les plugins: Plugin serving as a basis for plugins using MQTT
